mapper.select: select l.LESSON_IDX as lessonIdx, l.CATE2_IDX as cate2Idx, l.T_IDX as tIdx, l.LESSON_SUBJ as lessonSubj, l.LESSON_UP_DATE as lessonUpDate, l.LESSON_TYPE as lessonType, l.LESSON_PRICE as lessonPrice, l.LESSON_THUMBNAIL as lessonThumbnail, l.LESSON_SHORT_CONT as lessonShortCount, l.LESSON_STATE as lessonState, l.LESSON_KIT as lessonKit, t.T_NAME as tName from lesson_list l, teacher t where l.LESSON_IDX = #{lessonIdx} and l.T_IDX = t.T_IDX
